summary:
...SARA MEANDERING NEAR THE NORTHERN COAST OF HONDURAS... ...CATASTROPHIC FLOODING AND MUDSLIDES ONGOING FOR PORTIONS OF CENTRAL AMERICA...
 As of 12:00 PM CST Fri Nov 15
 the center of Sara was located near 16.1, -86.1

 with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.
